name: Orbitethers
description:
a game by:

Martin Bremer  and  Justin "Kabura" Neumann

made for the GMTK game jam 2021

NOTE: We have a patched version completed a bit after submissions were closed. Unfortunately, it's against the regulations of the jam to upload or link it. I cannot express how gutted I am that I cannot patch this anymore for the jam. In comparison to the patched version, the uploaded version is, in my opinion, barely playable.

- Martin Bremer, co-designer
